text: The 1300s was a decade that began on 1 January 1300 and ended on 31 December 1309. It is distinct from the decade known as the 131th decade which began on January 1, 1301 and ended on December 31, 1310. == Events and trends == * 1308 â€“ Avignon Papacy established, which splits and weakens the Roman Catholic Church
title: 1300s
